description: Notification under the Electronic Communications Code (Conditions and Restriction) Regulations 2003 (As Amended) to utilise permitted development rights for the following;- The removal of the following antenna: 3 x UTV SBHH-1D3817TB4 antenna at 25m and 3 x CVVPX308.10R3 antenna at 25m from the existing rooftop lattice stub tower.- The installation of 3 x new 2CPX208R-V3 antenna at 24.96m, and 3 x new RRZZT4S4-65B-R6 antenna at 24.95m utilising existing steelwork on the rooftop lattice stub tower.- The Installation of 18 RRH Units to the rear of the antenna un supporting rail brackets and support poles.- The installation of 1 x GPS Module at 26.2m off the existing stub tower headframe.- Ancillary works to include 3 x Multicore Fibre cables and 6 x DC Cables within existing cable management, 6 x 3 way DC Boxes, 12 x combiners and works within the existing equipment cabin.
